The reference for developers of streaming live TV and VOD Tizen .Net applications.The GUI is coded using React Native Tizen Dotnet framework. This sample illustrates how to utilize the elementary streams data source API (demuxed audio and video). The DRMed (MS PlayReady by CENC interface) and clean content can be played. MPEG DASH and RTP/RTSP content delivery protocols are implemented as a part of this app (no TV platform dependency). The HLS protocol and demuxing of the streams are handled by the FFMPEG open source library incorporated as .so binary files.
